Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model

Class Cash

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.Cash
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class Cash
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Represents the equivalent of money and costs in adrenaline: a triple of blue, red and yellow ammos.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Cash()
      Builds the default cash (0 amoms for each color)

      Builds a cash from the number of ammos of each color

      Builds a cash from an existing cash, cloning the number of ammos
      Cash​(AmmoColor c, int quantity)
      Builds a cash with the specified number of ammos of the specified color

      • subtract

        public Cash subtract​(Cash c)
        Creates a new cash with the result of the subtraction between this cash and the passed one. By subtraction between cash is intended the subtraction between each amount of ammos. Amounts of ammos can be negative. It does not modify this cash.
        Parameters:
        c - cash to subtract
        Returns:
        new cash with the subtraction result

      • sum

        public Cash sum​(Cash c)
        Creates a new cash with the result of the sum between this cash and the passed one. By addition between cash is intended the addition between each amount of ammos. It does not modify this cash.
        Parameters:
        c - cash to summ
        Returns:
        new cash with the addition result

      • pay

        public boolean pay​(Cash c)
        Checks if this cash can pay for the specified ammo cost, the it pays for it. Modifies this cash.
        Parameters:
        c - the ammo cost to pay.
        Returns:
        true if the payment is possible (no ammo is negative after payment)

      • deposit

        public void deposit​(Cash c)
        Deposits ammos in this cash, embedding the rule of maximum 3 ammos for each color. Exceeding ammos are lost. It modifies this cash.
        Parameters:
        c - ammos to deposit.

      • getTotal

        public int getTotal()
        Gets the total amount of ammos, of all colors
        Returns:
        the total amount of ammos
